name: Super Robot Taisen A Portable
overview: The story revolves around an organization called the Shadow-Mirror, which exists in a parallel world where events happened in a different way than the original game world, thus making the state of the worlds different, though a bit similar at times. Its leader, Vindel Mauser, desires a world of eternal war to make humanity improve more through war. His plan is to send his agents towards another dimension, spy on the defense forces of the world in order to make adjustments on the attack, and eventually conquer it. Featured series: Banpresto originals Chōdenji Robo Combattler V Chōdenji Machine Voltes V Tōshō Daimos Invincible Steel Man Daitarn 3 Metal Armor Dragonar (debut) Getter Robo Getter Robo G Shin Getter Robo (based on Banpresto's original design of Shin Getter Robo) Mobile Suit Gundam Mobile Suit Gundam: The 08th MS Team Mobile Suit Gundam 0083: Stardust Memory Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam Mobile Suit Gundam ZZ Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack Mobile Fighter G Gundam Gundam Wing: Endless Waltz Mazinger Z Great Mazinger Grendizer Martian Successor Nadesico (debut) Invincible Super Man Zambot 3
